rules:
1․ Age Check
Must be 18＋ to join and drink․ No exceptions․ If you're caught lying‚ you're out․

2․ Drink at Your Own Pace
No peer pressure․ If someone doesn't wanna drink (or needs a break)‚ respect that․
3․ Respect is Law
Keep it friendly and respectful, no harassment‚ creepy behavior or crossing personal boundaries․
Consent applies in VR too․ Don't get weird with avatars or voices․
4․ Mic Etiquette
No ear-shattering noises‚ mic spam‚ or screaming into the void․
If you're slurring too hard or being disruptive‚ take a break․
5․ Keep the Vibes Up
Drama‚ trolling‚ or bringing real-world fights into the party? Nah․ You'll be muted or booted․
6․ Avatar Limits
No flashing⁄strobing avatars or overly NSFW ones unless everyone agrees․
7․ Know When to Log Off
If you're wasted and starting to spiral‚ it is okay to dip․ Rest up‚ we'll see you next session․
8․Keep the instance going
If the instance is ongoing, please do not open a competing smashed instance unless disgussed with the remaining moderators/owners.
infoBoard:
Zentaka is a multinational cybernetics and defense conglomerate specializing in human augmentation‚ neural interfacing‚ and advanced bio-mechanical systems․ With headquarters in the Neo-Tokyo Arcology and operations in over 80 territories‚ Zentaka remains at the forefront of post-human innovation‚ seamlessly integrating man and machine․

Founded in 2047 by visionary industrialist Epsi‚ the company rose to prominence through exclusive military contracts and rapid advancements in neural mesh technology․ Instrumental to Zentaka's cutting-edge developments is REDACTED‚ a master schematics engineer whose designs have shaped the next generation of cybernetic systems․ Today‚ Zentaka's subsidiaries span civilian prosthetics, surveillance AI‚ private security‚ and consciousness preservation․
